Use o teclado do seu computador para toc: Use your computer keyboard to play the virtual drum kit.
Começe pela a bateria virtual, e depois: Start with the virtual drum kit, then apply your new skills to a real drum kit. A fun way to practice with the virtual drum kit is to play along with your favorite songs.
Para que seja possível criar partituras,: To create sheet music, it's necessary to first learn how to identify each component of the drum kit. This is done using the traditional staff notation.
O pentagrama/ou pauta é um conjunto de c: The staff notation consists of five lines and four spaces where musical figures are written. The lines and spaces are counted from bottom to top. In the case of drums, the notation indicates the rhythmic cells and specifies which drum component should be played at which time.
Representação das peças da bateria no pe: Representation of drum kit components on the staff
Os ritmos primários na bateria são os fu: Primary drum rhythms are the essential foundations every drummer should know and master. They form the basis for playing more advanced rhythms. Try practicing some primary rhythms:
em seguida toque chimbal juntamente com: then play hi-hat together with the snare drum
toque chimbal em todos os 4 tempos do co: play hi-hat on all 4 beats of the measure
e toque caixa no tempo 3: and play snare drum on beat 3
Experimente tocar com Metrónomo e compar: Try playing with a metronome and share your performance with the community.
Deficientes visuais: saiba como ferramen: Visually impaired: learn how tools can help you promote equity in your company
Investir em ferramentas para deficientes: Investing in tools for visually impaired individuals is essential to achieve social equality. After all, they allow this group to explore their full potential without limits. So, see what they are, understand how essential they are in daily life and work.
Deficientes visuais são aqueles que tive: Visually impaired individuals are those who have experienced partial or total loss of vision. This can result from various factors such as glaucoma, cataracts, injuries, and more. Additionally, they can be divided into three groups:
cegueira legal: possuem 20/200 ou menos: legal blindness: have 20/200 or less in the better eye;
baixa visão: mesmo com uso de óculos ou: low vision: even with the use of glasses or lenses, they do not see properly;
cegueira total: não têm percepção visual: total blindness: have no visual perception at all.
É essencial saber que a deficiência visu: It is essential to know that visual impairment does not prevent a person from having a normal life. In other words, they can build a career, family, and have leisure activities like anyone else.
Outro ponto relevante é que quando esses: Another relevant point is that when these individuals are part of an inclusive team, they help improve results significantly. However, they need access to appropriate items for that.
Por que é crucial oferecer ferramentas p: Why is it crucial to provide tools for visually impaired individuals?
Oferecer ferramentas apropriadas para de: Providing appropriate tools for visually impaired individuals helps promote inclusion and equality. This is because they make it possible for everyone to participate in daily activities. Additionally, there are other relevant points:
Ao investir em itens adequados, a sua em: By investing in appropriate items, your company is complying with the law. After all, Law No. 13,146, of July 6, 2015, defines that promoting equality conditions is mandatory in every company.
Stevie Wonder, Andrea Bocelli e Helen Ke: Stevie Wonder, Andrea Bocelli, and Helen Keller are individuals who have proven their talent throughout history. Thus, they have shown that with the right tools, it is possible to shine and leave a great legacy in the world.
Quais são as melhores ferramentas para d: What are the best tools for visually impaired individuals?
O leitor de tela é uma ótima ferramenta: Screen reader is a great tool for visually impaired individuals. This is because it is software that converts displayed text into audio or Braille. But also others, such as:
Todos os itens citados tem o poder de ot: All mentioned items have the power to optimize the routine of people with disabilities who are part of this group. But to make this clearer, see how each of them works below.
Os ampliadores de tela, como o próprio n: Screen magnifiers, as the name suggests, are used to increase font size. Thus, individuals with low vision or legal blindness can perform their tasks with them.
É bom saber que eles funcionam tanto em: It's good to know that they work on both computers and other mobile devices such as smartphones or tablets. Therefore, you will be able to implement them in your company without difficulty.
No mercado, já existem teclados e displa: In the market, there are already keyboards and displays with an ideal design for blind people. Thus, they have high contrast and ripples. Additionally, they have a protection that makes the piece last longer.
O padrão das letras é a ABNT e eles são: The lettering is ABNT standard and they are plugged in with a USB cable. Therefore, it is a piece that follows the standard and is easy to install.
Hoje em dia, existem películas que torna: Nowadays, there are films that make keys tactile on cell phones and tablets. Therefore, they contain small bubbles that inflate dynamically to help with agility and practicality.
The piece is not yet for sale in Brazil. Therefore, if you want, you will have to look for it on international sales sites. Besides, it does not adapt to computers, which is a downside for companies.
Por ser uma boa ideia, é provável que el: Because it is a good idea, it is likely to be embraced by the national market and adapted to other items. So, it's worth paying attention to buy it when it's available in Brazil.
O relógio inteligente faz com que o indi: The smartwatch allows the individual to send and read messages. Thus, it is great for those who need to send a quick response about a project or meeting.
Outro fator relevante é que ele ajuda a: Another relevant factor is that it helps monitor physical activities. So, if your company likes to promote health and well-being, it can be ideal. Moreover, it is generally compatible with Android and iOS.
A luta robótica ajuda a “ver” com as mão: The robotic glove helps to “see” with the hands. This is because this device has cameras that describe the environment. Thus, upon entering a meeting room, for example, it will be able to have the same sense of space as anyone else.
O encaixe é ergonômico e a peça é muito: The fit is ergonomic, and the piece is very easy to use. Therefore, visually impaired individuals will be able to use it without difficulty, which will greatly improve their quality of life.
É essencial saber que essa é uma peça de: It is essential to know that this is a high-tech piece that will make a big difference for the company. After all, it will show the team that everyone's well-being is crucial. Therefore, it will show everyone that they are in the right place.
Quais os maiores desafios para os defici: What are the biggest challenges for visually impaired individuals at work?
O acesso a dados é um dos maiores desafi: Access to data is one of the biggest challenges for visually impaired individuals at work. This is because, to this day, many companies do not have suitable items for this group. Additionally, there are other issues, such as:
falta de estrutura com conforto e segura: lack of structure with comfort and security;
exclusão por parte do time ou clientes;: exclusion by the team or clients;
falta de qualificação profissional forne: lack of professional qualification provided by the company.
Apesar da sociedade já ter evoluído, ain: Although society has already evolved, there is still a daily struggle to change all the points mentioned. It is also worth mentioning that everyone should join the cause.
É dever das empresas investir na acessib: It is the duty of companies to invest in accessibility continuously. By doing so, it will be possible to ensure a better and more inclusive world for everyone. Moreover, one way to achieve this goal is to have all or a large part of the items discussed.
Quando providos de ferramentas adequadas: When provided with appropriate tools, people with disabilities show that they have the same capacity as anyone else. Therefore, it is worth fighting with them for the cause of inclusion.
É lei: consumidor com deficiência visual: It's law: visually impaired consumers can request Braille contracts at no extra cost
Medida vale para documentos de fornecedo: The measure applies to documents from suppliers of goods or services and financial institutions. Adhesion contracts and other essential documents in the consumer's relationship with a company may be requested in Braille or other formats accessible to visually impaired persons in the State of Rio. And this without generating additional charges. The determination is from Law 10.343/24, approved by the Legislative Assembly (Alerj) and sanctioned by Governor Cláudio Castro.
A lei, proposta pela deputada Martha Roc: The law, proposed by Deputy Martha Rocha, applies to documents from suppliers of goods or services and financial institutions. The choice of format for the adhesion document is up to the consumer. Non-compliance with the standard may result in a fine of up to R$ 22,700 (5,000 UFIR-RJ), doubled in case of recurrence.
Segundo o texto publicado no Diário Ofic: According to the text published in the Official Gazette, the amount collected in fines must be reverted to the State Council Fund for the Integration of Persons with Disabilities.

Ação, drama, comédia… diversos personage: Action, drama, comedy... Several blind characters have already starred in great films in cinema history! How about getting to know better the world of blind and low vision people in cinematographic works? Some titles on the list, such as the documentary about Dorina Nowill and 'Hoje Eu Não Quero Voltar Sozinho', feature audio description so that visually impaired people can also enjoy them in every detail.
Afinal, quem é que não gosta de um filmi: After all, who doesn't like a little movie with popcorn in their spare time?
Descrição da imagem: cena em preto e bra: Image description: black and white scene of the two main characters from City Lights. It's daytime and they are on a sidewalk. The man wears an old frock coat, bow tie, and bowler hat. The young blind florist is on the right, in profile. She holds a flower with her fingertips and smiles. End of description.
Começamos com um clássico do cinema mudo: We start with a silent film classic starring Charlie Chaplin. The famous character Tramp falls in love with a young blind florist, who mistakes him for a millionaire. To not disappoint her, he pretends to be rich.
Descrição da imagem: cena de O Demolidor: Image description: scene from Daredevil. He is portrayed from the chest up, with a furrowed forehead, wearing red clothing and a mask with two small horns. In the background, there are the tops of some buildings and an orange, rainy sky. End of description.
Um acidente deixa o advogado Matt Murdoc: An accident leaves lawyer Matt Murdock blind in childhood, but also gives him super-sensory powers. At night, he is Daredevil, a masked vigilante fighting for justice on the streets of New York. In addition to the film, the Marvel superhero also got his own series.
Image description: scene from Ray. Actor Jamie Foxx is portrayed from the chest up, in half-profile, singing into a silver microphone. He wears sunglasses and smiles. End of description.
‘Ray’ é baseado na vida do famoso cantor: 'Ray' is based on the life of the famous blind singer and pianist Ray Charles, who lost his vision due to glaucoma in childhood. Jamie Foxx's impressive performance won him the Oscar for Best Actor in 2005. The film also won an award for Best Sound Mixing.
Descrição da imagem: cena do filme Hoje: Image description: scene from The Way He Looks. Two teenagers are talking at a table. They are sitting facing each other, in profile, and smiling. End of description.
Nesta produção brasileira, um adolescent: In this Brazilian production, a blind teenager seeks independence while dealing with his mother's overprotection. When a new student arrives at school, he will also have to deal with new feelings.
Descrição da imagem: cena do filme Perfu: Image description: scene from Scent of a Woman. A couple is portrayed from the waist up, dancing in a restaurant. End of description.
Em uma atuação que lhe rendeu o Oscar de: In a performance that earned him the Oscar for Best Actor, **Al Pacino** plays a blind and stubborn military man who intends to fulfill an old dream before he dies. He then hires a young student to help him spend a weekend in New York, but the young man will also help him see life in a different way.
Descrição da imagem: cena do filme Dança: Image description: scene from Dancer in the Dark. A brunette girl smiles and looks at another girl with blonde hair, who touches her face with both hands. End of description.
A cantora islandesa Bjork interpreta uma: Icelandic singer Bjork plays a Czech immigrant who has an inherited disease that causes blindness. A single mother, she decides to move to the USA to get surgery for her 12-year-old son before he also loses his sight.
Descrição da imagem: cena do filme A cor: Image description: scene from The Color of Paradise. A man and a boy walk along a green road. They are facing each other. The man carries two suitcases. The boy wears sunglasses and walks beside him. End of description.
O filme conta a história de um garoto ce: The film tells the story of a blind boy who lives in a boarding school. His father is ashamed of his disability and tries to keep him hidden during the holidays, when the boy has to return home, but he will learn an important life lesson from his son.
Descrição da imagem: cena do filme À pri: Image description: scene from At First Sight. A man wearing sunglasses touches a woman's face with both hands. End of description.
Depois de passar a maior parte de sua vi: After spending most of his life blind, a man has the chance to regain his sight through a new experimental procedure. With the success of the surgery, he will have to relearn how to deal with the world seeing again and will rely on his girlfriend's help for that.
Descrição da imagem: cena em preto e bra: Image description: black and white scene from The Miracle Worker. A girl looks forward. Beside her, a woman looks at her and gestures with one hand in front of her face. She wears sunglasses. End of description.
Filme baseado na história real e comoven: Film based on the real and touching story of teacher Anne Sullivan, who strives to help Helen Keller, a blind, deaf, and mute girl, adapt to the world around her. The teacher ends up picking a fight with the girl's parents, who prefer to spoil her out of pity rather than teach her something meaningful.
Descrição da imagem: capa do documentári: Image description: cover of the documentary Dorina - Looking at the World. On the left, there is braille text on a textured background. In the center, there is a watermark image of Dorina Nowill's face. She is in profile and smiling. End of description.
Ator de Anatomia de Uma Queda realmente: Actor from Anatomy of a Fall really has visual impairment? Director was impressed with the “way Milo spoke”
Descricao da Imagem: personagem milo dep: Description of the Image: character milo depondo, featured image representing Anatomy of a Fall
Uma das maiores produções do ano,: One of the biggest productions of the year,
já está disponível no streaming. Dirigid: is already available for streaming. Directed by Justine Triet, the Oscar-winning production for Best Original Screenplay at the 96th edition of the award stars
O suspense tem início quando um homem é: The suspense begins when a man is found dead in the snow outside the isolated chalet where he lived with his wife Sandra (Hüller), a German writer, and their 11-year-old visually impaired son. The investigation concludes that it was a "suspicious death": it is impossible to know for sure whether he took his own life or was murdered. The widow is indicted, with her own son in the midst of the conflict: between trial and family life, doubts weigh on the mother-son relationship, as the boy is the only witness to what happened.
Com uma performance brilhante, o intérpr: With a brilliant performance, Daniel's interpreter, the protagonist's son, caught attention for his dedication to the role. In an interview with The Wrap, the director of the film revealed that the “audition with Milo was quite similar” to casting the cast of E.T. - The Extraterrestrial, by Steven Spielberg.
Durante o processo de escalação, a diret: During the casting process, the director approached many questions about the content of the young actor's lines. “Everyone told us: 'This script really doesn't work because a child doesn't speak like that.' I said: 'Huh? My 8-year-old daughter speaks like that. It is definitely possible'”, which was proven by the project's execution.
Ela mencionou que, apesar de ter pensado: She mentioned that, although she had thought of an actor with visual impairment, something that suits the character, she was enchanted with an aspect of Milo, who is not blind. Still, the artist was not the first choice, as he was not as similar to Sandra. However, his producer closely observed his test tape and asked Justine to just listen to the recording. “The way Milo spoke was different,” she recalled. “It didn't sound like a child, and I really liked that about him.”
Na audição, Milo foi convidado a fazer u: In the audition, Milo was invited to do one of the scenes from the movie, actually: “And in 10 seconds,” Triet recalled, “he became totally different, totally inside the character. He had tears all over his face, actually.
Ela completa: \"E naquele momento pedi a: She completes: “And at that moment I asked him to say his character's lines at the end of the film, which no one had done perfectly for me before. And he did the whole scene, right there, right in front of us. We were so impressed,” she recalled. “It was so complex all the things that were happening to him at that moment. But he made everything seem so easy.
Anatomia de uma Queda está disponível no: Anatomy of a Fall is available in the Prime Video catalog.

title: 'Art saved my life', says deaf graffiti artist participating in an exhibition in São Paulo
imageAlt: Odrus, deaf graffiti artist, in front of one of his works
paragraph1: The graffiti artist Odrus, the artistic name of Rafael Caldeira dos Santos, revealed in an interview that art was fundamental in transforming his life. At 40 years old, he shares his story of overcoming and how artistic expression rescued him from a past of revolt and lack of perspective.
paragraph2: Coming from a context of social exclusion and facing physical and sensory limitations, Odrus went through difficult periods in his adolescence, including internments in resocialization institutions due to his history of involvement in robberies. He mentions that art not only saved him but also seeks to inspire other people with hearing impairments and those facing similar challenges.
paragraph3: "I come from the periphery, from a youth of many deprivations, suffering prejudice and living in a time when there were few sign language interpreters. I went down a bad path, but art saved me. Now, I want to show that, through it, we can be whatever we want," said Odrus, who expresses himself through Brazilian Sign Language (Libras).
paragraph4: Odrus is known for including Libras signs in part of his graffiti, making his work accessible and inspiring to more deaf people. He started his artistic journey more than 20 years ago, introduced to Hip Hop culture and graffiti by a friend.
paragraph5: "People judged what I did a lot. But, as I believed, I had the patience to show that what I produce is art. It was necessary to roll up my sleeves and not give up," he added, reflecting on the challenges he faced early in his career.
paragraph6: Currently, Odrus lives off graffiti work orders, mainly to illustrate the facades of businesses and schools in Brasília, where he resides. Additionally, he shares his talent through workshops at the Fundação Casa, seeking to provide new transformative opportunities with art for minorities and people in vulnerable situations.
paragraph7: His work is being highlighted in the exhibition 'Beyond the Streets, Graffiti Stories' at Itaú Cultural, in São Paulo, until July 30. The show features works by 50 graffiti artists and is an important opportunity for deaf people to see Odrus as a model of overcoming and inspiration.

'Arte salvou minha vida', diz grafiteiro: 'Art saved my life', says deaf graffiti artist participating in exhibition in São Paulo
Odrus, grafiteiro surdo, em frente a uma: Odrus, deaf graffiti artist, in front of one of his works
O grafiteiro Odrus, nome artístico de Ra: The graffiti artist Odrus, the artistic name of Rafael Caldeira dos Santos, revealed in an interview that art was fundamental in transforming his life. At 40, he shares his story of overcoming obstacles and how artistic expression rescued him from a past of rebellion and lack of perspective.
Vindo de um contexto de exclusão social: Coming from a context of social exclusion and facing physical and sensory limitations, Odrus went through difficult periods in adolescence, including institutionalizations in resocialization institutions due to his involvement in robberies. He mentions that art not only saved him but also seeks to inspire other people with hearing impairments and those facing similar challenges.
'Venho da periferia, de juventude de mui: 'I come from the outskirts, from a youth of many deprivations, suffering prejudice and living in a time when there were few Libras interpreters. I went down a bad path, but art saved me. Now, I want to show that, through it, we can be whatever we want,' said Odrus, who expresses himself through Brazilian Sign Language (Libras).
Odrus é conhecido por incluir sinais em: Odrus is known for including Libras signs in part of his graffiti, making his work accessible and inspiring for more deaf people. He started his artistic journey over 20 years ago, introduced to Hip Hop culture and graffiti by a friend.
'Julgavam muito o que eu fazia. Mas, com: 'They judged a lot of what I did. But since I believed in it, I had the patience to show that what I produce is art. It was necessary to roll up my sleeves and not give up,' he added, reflecting on the challenges he faced at the beginning of his career.
Atualmente, Odrus vive de encomendas de: Currently, Odrus lives off commissioned graffiti work, mainly illustrating the facades of businesses and schools in Brasília, where he resides. Additionally, he shares his talent through workshops at Fundação Casa, seeking to provide new transformative opportunities with art for minorities and people in vulnerable situations.
Seu trabalho está sendo destacado na exp: His work is being highlighted in the exhibition 'Beyond the Streets, Stories of Graffiti' at Itaú Cultural, in São Paulo, until July 30. The exhibition features works by 50 graffiti artists and is an important opportunity for deaf people to see Odrus as a model of overcoming and inspiration.

Orquestra parassinfônica fará sua estrei: Parasymphonic Orchestra will make its debut at Sala São Paulo
A Opesp, Orquestra Parassinfônica de São: Opesp, the Parasymphonic Orchestra of São Paulo, is preparing for its debut at Sala São Paulo on the next December 3rd, coinciding with the International Day of Persons with Disabilities. Composed of 32 musicians, almost half of them with disabilities, the orchestra was formed through a call for diverse talents.
Desde outubro, os músicos têm participad: Since October, the musicians have been participating in intensive rehearsals for the debut, which will be conducted by maestro Roberto Tibiriçá. The initiative was conceived by Igor Cayres, a cultural producer inspired by musicians like João Carlos Martins and groups like the blind women's choir, aiming to highlight artists with disabilities in prominent roles in music.
Um dos músicos da Opesp é Miriã Vitória: One of the musicians in Opesp is Miriã Vitória dos Santos, who found a passion for music since childhood and now plays cello in the orchestra. Diagnosed with cerebral palsy at the age of 2, Miriã sees her participation in Opesp as a milestone of representation and professionalization in music.
Miriã Vitória, violoncelista da Orquestr: Miriã Vitória, cellist of the Parasymphonic Orchestra of São Paulo
O futuro da Opesp inclui mais apresentaç: The future of Opesp includes more performances in 2023 and the opening of new calls to integrate more musicians with disabilities into the project, promoting diversity in classical music.

A percussão corporal é uma forma de expr: Body percussion is a form of musical expression that uses the body as an instrument. It involves producing sounds and rhythms through claps, slaps, finger snaps, foot stomps, and other body movements. It's a fun and educational practice that helps develop motor coordination, rhythm, concentration, and creativity.
Você tem a liberdade de criar ritmos uti: You have the freedom to create rhythms using your creativity, even accompanying well-known songs. Below, we offer an example with the 'baião' rhythm. This is one of thousands of ways to play this Brazilian rhythm.
Neste ritmograma temos indicações para t: In this rhythm chart, we have instructions for playing the 'baião' as follows
Tente agora desenvolver acompanhando uma: Now, try to develop by playing along with a song. Below, we depict the bossa nova, so you can follow along with the song 'The Girl from Ipanema' or another of your choice.
Agora é com você: crie suas próprias bat: Now it's up to you: create your own beats and share with the community.

A percussão corporal é uma forma de expr: Body percussion is a form of musical expression that uses the body as an instrument. It involves producing sounds and rhythms through beats, claps, finger snaps, foot stomps, and other body movements. It's a fun and educational practice that helps develop motor coordination, rhythm, concentration, and creativity.
Você tem a liberdade de criar ritmos uti: You have the freedom to create rhythms using your creativity, even accompanying well-known songs. Below we offer an example with the Baião rhythm. This is one of thousands of ways to play this Brazilian rhythm.
Neste ritmograma temos indicações para t: In this rhythmic pattern, we have indications to play Baião as follows:
2° Estale os dedos duas vezes alternadam: 2nd Snap fingers twice alternately (right and left)
5° E por último finalize com uma palma s: 5th And finally, finish with a single clap.
Repita essa sequência para ver a música: Repeat this sequence to see the music unfold.
Tente agora desenvolver acompanhando uma: Now try developing it while listening to a song. Below we represent Bossa Nova, so you can follow the song 'Garota de Ipanema', or choose another song if you prefer.
1° Comece com um tapa no peito utilizand: 1st Start with a chest slap using the right hand
4° Volte ao início com a mão direita, re: 4th Return to the beginning with the right hand, repeating like this. See the music happen.
Agora é com você: crie suas próprias bat: Now it's your turn: create your own beats and share with the community.
